short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loads new windows with specific tabs. Clear all existing tabs and open only the new window or avoiding clearing existing tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to manage Chrome windows with ease and speed. You can organize tabs into custom environments and open each environment in a new window with its designated tabs. Additionally, you have the option to open a new window while closing any existing tabs, helping you keep your workspace clutter-free and organized. Also can use shortcuts to open the environments.
